CustomField.description: Checked if Lead Source Contains ZB Dandu. To be referred in Process Builder
CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduDigital' ), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduDigitalLab'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduDigitalRestorative'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduDigitalSurgical'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduHome'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduPeriImplant'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduPeriImplantM1Prevent'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduPeriImplantM2Treat'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduPeriImplantM3Revise'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduPrecisePrep'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduPrecisePrepPerfectStart'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ZBDanduPrecisePrepPreciseDrill ') )
CustomField.label: Is ZBDandu
